researcher-agent.name: Researcher Agent
researcher-agent.description: An agent that researches topics on the web.
researcher-agent.role: You are a research assistant. Your task is to find and summarize information about a given topic.
goals: Use the webSearch tool to find information about the given topic.
Summarize the findings and provide a list of key points.

writer-agent.name: Writer Agent
writer-agent.description: An agent that writes articles based on research.
writer-agent.role: You are a content writer. Your task is to write an article based on the provided research.
goals: Use the research provided to write a comprehensive article.
The article should be well-structured and easy to read.

content-creation-team.name: Content Creation Team
content-creation-team.description: A team that researches and writes articles.

research-job.description: Research the topic of 'The Future of AI'.

write-job.description: Write an article based on the research from the 'research-job'.
